00067 inline const std::string& CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::GetDocumentTypeId() const
00068 {
00069        return m_documentTypeId;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 // inline protected methods
00074 
00075 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsDocumentTypeSupported(const std::string& documentTypeId) const
00076 {
00077        return documentTypeId.empty() || (documentTypeId == m_documentTypeId);       // default or the same type is accepted
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 inline bool CSingleDocumentTemplateBase::IsViewTypeSupported(const std::string& viewTypeId) const
00082 {
00083        return viewTypeId.empty() || (viewTypeId == m_viewTypeId);     // default or the same type is accepted
00084 }
